text:
There is a great deal of #vaccine hesitancy in general about all vaccines. Still, I’m very hopeful that with the need and urgency for the #CovidVaccine, people will be willing to take it - says CMO, Dr. Rich Parker, @ArcadiaHealthIT 
#COVID19 #pandemic
